text:
I find the space peaceful with really beautiful Buddhas. And the teachings and guided meditations are easy to follow and very practical for a newbie like me..
Fees are reasonable, I guess its to help keep the centre running. I'll come back again!

Great way to unwind after work. There’s prayer chanting, meditation, and a discussion on Buddhas point of view on philosophy with the intent to make it usable in our every day life. Have been going for the last few months and it’s brought about a big change in me. It’s very relaxing.
Richard is a great teacher. I took a 4-session course here on how to overcome negative emotions.

If you want to know what are Buddha's teachings in English and Chinese, this is the place to learn. I had called myself a Buddhist for a long time but I know Buddha's teachings superficially. Yet like learning golf, you need to learn to learn the right strokes from the very beginning from an experienced golf instructor, without correction later on. This is the place with the right lineage and therefore right teachings. I am speaking from personal experience.

The Teachings are precious knowledge and applicable to everyday life.
Meditation was well guided that helps calm the mind and see things with a new perspective.
This place is a treasure trove, love it  :)
